text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Against all odds, the last humans to escape Earth must learn to harness this power or die by it.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Against all odds, the last humans left on Earth had to learn to harness this power or risk another attack, maybe the last.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Against all odds, the last humans left on Earth had to learn to harness this power or risk another attack, maybe the last. With the help of science and science fiction, they find a way to tap into that power.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Against all odds, the last humans left on Earth had to learn to harness this power or risk another attack, maybe the last. As it turns out, some of the humans had developed the ability to levitate, but it was weak and they couldn't do it for long. So they practiced and practiced. The "Last Ones" as they called themselves, developed games and challenges that they would complete together to strengthen this magical ability.

Thirteen years after the alien invasion, humanity has begun to understand this magic.

However, competition sparked between the Last Ones over who was best at it.

Against all odds, the last humans left on Earth had to learn to harness this power or risk another attack, maybe the last. The "Last Ones" as they called themselves, developed games and challenges that they would complete together to strengthen this magical ability. 

Thirteen years after the alien invasion, humanity had begun to understand this magic. Mana meant that people were not only able to levitate themselves, but other objects and creatures as well. With the regained ability of Mana, the human race felt ready once again to protect itself, should another alien attack occur. However, competition sparked between the Last Ones over who was best at it. Instead of focusing on their powers for good, about a majority of the people were competitive over who had the stronger powers. The aliens had been watching all of this unfold from afar, waiting for the right moment to attack. The Earth, once again became vulnerable to attack because people were too busy competing and fighting to care for one another or to get ready for an alien attack.

Thirteen years after the alien invasion, humanity had begun to understand this magic. Mana meant that people were not only able to levitate themselves, but other objects and creatures as well. With the regained ability of Mana, the human race felt ready once again to protect itself, should another alien attack occur. However, competition sparked between the Last Ones over who was best at it. Instead of focusing on their powers for good, about a majority of the people were competitive over who had the stronger powers. The aliens had been watching all of this unfold from afar, waiting for the right moment to attack. The Earth, once again became vulnerable to attack because people were too busy competing and fighting to care for one another or to get ready for an alien attack. 

When the next attack came, it was a complete surprise to the world. No one survived it but a few and those were the people who worked together instead of competing over power. They had to leave Earth and find a new home because Earth had now been taken over aliens. The moral of the story here is to remember what is important for the future or it may be taken away when you least expect it.
